greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangular array read by rows: T(n,1) = T(n,n) = 1, T(n,k) = 4*T(n-1, k-1) + 2*T(n-1, k).
reference: TERMESZET VILAGA XI.TERMESZET-TUDOMANY DIAKPALYAZAT 133.EVF. 6.SZ. jun. 2002. Vegh Lea (and Vegh Erika): "Pascal-tipusu haromszogek" http://www.kfki.hu/chemonet/TermVil/tv2002/tv0206/tartalom.html
link: G. C. Greubel, Rows n = 1..100 of triangle, flattened
maple: end: seq(seq(T(n, k), k=1..n), n=1..12); # _G. C. Greubel_, Nov 18 2019
program: if k eq 1 or k eq n then return 1;
[T(n,k): k in [1..n], n in [1..12]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Nov 18 2019
[[T(n, k) for k in (1..n)] for n in (1..12)] # _G. C. Greubel_, Nov 18 2019
results.author: _Zerinvary Lajos_, Jun 14 2006
